ModMetaData.name: [sd] pillows and beanbags
ModMetaData.author: sulusdacor
ModMetaData.description:
"Of pillows and beanbags" Ver.: 1.0-1.0.0
- could be the title of an epic tale, which might take place in your colony. or just a mod that adds these to the game for your colonists to sit on ;) - stats of the pillow and beanbag are the same as the armchair - only exception: all pillows have reduced cover and less walking impairment, and weight a bit less - texture of the pillow can be switched by rotating it
Download links for Dropbox (current or older versions) or Steamworkshop link for current Rimworld version can be found in the ludeon forum thread linked above.
